name: Devenish Nutrition Ltd.
goal: A farming and food company, delivering sustainable and innovative nutritional products and solutions for the feed industry, the food industry and for human health.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Education, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: CAP policy; Nutrition and health claim regulation (Regulation 1924-2006); Regulation on provision of food information to consumers (Regulation 1169-2011); Agricultural land management policies
